about_the_game:
Dice-Zee! DUELS adds a whole new dimension to this classic dice rolling game! Now you'll not just be trying to achieve a high score, but you'll be trying to survive epic old school RPG battles against AI opponents as well as fierce fantasy beasts such as fire golems, towering trolls, and majestic dragons!

The dice will now be rolled to support your decisions on where to attack, how to attack. Roll for hit chance, evasion chance, chance to crit, chance to hit, damage, modifiers, and so much more!

Rewarding game play with rare randomly generated loot that nobody else will possess should inspire you to conquer these wars on the new wastelands of Dice-Zee!
